posts.post_content:
Avoid the confusing mess eBay has created; no need to put your faith in those big auction houses of questionable repute; forget walking up and down aisles and aisles of crap at shows…oh, wait…there aren’t any more shows, at least here in southern California…just look right here at a list of some items I am currently offering. Some interesting, some not so much. Will consider offers for singles, groups or the whole group. Cash/Trade offers are fine. All must make sense to each of us. My collecting interests are T204’s, PCL cards, S74 silks with backs, T3’s and others.
Prices include SH&I. PayPal OK with no additional vig. Email me for high resolution F&B scans and I will respond promptly. 
Thanks for looking, and in no particular order:
